headline: J.D. Vance's Book Sales Got Bigger Boost from Trump Than Netflix
author: Rob Minto
sentences: Currently, the book is ranked 170 on Amazon in the overall books list for the U.S., but is number one in several categories including 'Poverty,' 'Sociology of Rural Areas,' and 'Sociology of Class.'
According to Amazon data accessed by using internet archive the Wayback Machine, it rose in November 2020 to 160 in the Amazon book rankingsa rise of around 500 places from a few months previously.
